item.title: Npc with mage and melee? for Corp beast
item.dc:creator: @zammykid1 zammykid1
item.description:
@zammykid1 wrote:

ok well i just added corp got most things working just have to work on adding drops and making it use mage/melee.

drops ik how to do but the mage/melee is a little tougher.

i went through npchandler.java and looked at jad,mith drag and kbd but the codes were very scattered.
im hoping some1 could help me.
using agspking source, devo based 317 [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 12, 2009, 07:44:00 pm[/size][hr]btw atm i kinda coded it wierd so that right now its using melee but protect for mage only works. yea ik retarded :P. the code i have atm

[code] } else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1114 && !plr.ProtMage) {

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 64;
hitDiff = 20 + misc.random(45);
plr.playerLevel[5] -= 8;

                                } else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1114 && plr.ProtMelee) {

npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 64;
hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(30);
plr.playerLevel[5] -= 8;[/code]

also its coded very poorly as im not a “pro” so any help on that is appreciated ty in advance
